channel.title: Side-Hustle on FinanceCraftedSheets
channel.description: Recent content in Side-Hustle on FinanceCraftedSheets

item.title: Side Hustle Math: When It's Worth Your Time (And When It Isn't)
item.description: Learn how to calculate net hourly rates, weigh opportunity costs, and recognize burnout before your side hustle costs you more than it earns.

item.title: The Reseller's Spreadsheet: How to Track Inventory and Price for Profit
item.description: Most resellers underprice their items and lose track of profit. Here's how to build a reseller inventory spreadsheet and price every item for maximum margin.

item.title: How to Start a Side Hustle While Working Full-Time (A Finance Guy's Approach)
item.description: A finance professional's actionable guide to launching a side hustle without burning out. Learn time management, expense tracking, and tax strategies for 2026.

item.title: Side Hustle Taxes: The Complete Guide for Freelancers & Gig Workers
item.description: Navigate side hustle taxes without panic. Learn what you owe, what you can deduct, how to pay quarterly taxes, and how to stay compliant year-round.

item.title: Side Hustle Income Tracking â€“ Stop Losing Money Without Knowing It
item.description: 73% of side hustlers are bleeding money through hidden costs. Track this or watch profit disappear into fees.
